entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:02 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -16.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 01:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -16.6°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -18.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early in the morning. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the evening then clearing. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
